summary: A suggestible working-class innocent wins the lottery but lets himself be taken advantage of by his bourgeois new boyfriend and his circle of materialistic friends.
cast: Peter Chatel|Rainer Werner Fassbinder|Karlheinz Böhm|Adrian Hoven|Christiane Maybach|Harry Baer|Hans Zander|Kurt Raab|Rudolf Lenz|Karl Scheydt|Peter Kern|Karl-Heinz Staudenmeyer|Walter Sedlmayr|Bruce Low|Marquard Bohm|Brigitte Mira|Evelyn Künneke|Barbara Valentin|Elma Karlowa|Ingrid Caven|Lilo Pempeit|Ulla Jacobsson|Hark Bohm|Katherina Buchhammer|El Hedi ben Salem|Irm Hermann|Dietrich Kerky|Ursula Strätz
title: La ley del más fuerte
